name: Contract Killer: Sniper Assass
description:
Contract Killer: Sniper Assassin 19 is a first person shooter with anti-terrorism as its theme. the game has a variety of challenging shooting missions, you must use advanced weapons and superb shooting ability to complete the mission.
Features:
- Real battlefield environment
- Show your shooting skills
- Play games anytime, anywhere
- Amazing music and sound effects
- Various challenging missions
- A lot of powerful weapons.
